attributes.action: For rail companies to offer part-time rail fare options for part-time workers.
attributes.background:
With the recent rail fare increases and improvements in smart card technology I am disappointed to see that there are no options for part-time workers to save on their season tickets.
This greatly disadvantages those with caring responsibilities particularly women and acts as a barrier to work.

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on rail companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to require train companies to offer part-time season tickets, if that's what you would like to happen.
